name: unpredictability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or fact of being unpredictable (= likely to change suddenly and without reason): Probably the only predictable thing about the British weather is its unpredictability. His unpredictability is what makes him so difficult to play against. See
unpredictable
More examplesFewer examplesAdding to the unpredictability of the situation is ongoing political instability in the country.The one constant throughout the crisis has been its unpredictability.The meetings have an air of unpredictability.
